data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe people who thrive on hard work.
data.answer: The reasons why hard work is so important for some people are various. Personally, the sense of achievement is the first and foremost reason for hardworking. There is no shortcut to success, and hard work is the only key to achieving it. Through hard work, we can learn discipline, dedication, and determination, which are all valuable characteristics that one should pursue in their entire life. And only by doing so, one can demonstrate that others can trust him or her. That is to say, talk the talk, walk the walk. What's more, one can find happiness and joy in hard work. There is no doubt that those who feel the most fulfilled at the end of their lives are those who have chosen to work hard. Besides, people can gain practical experience by working hard, which is an essential component of better performance. （143 字）

options.content: Why is hard work so important for some people?
